title: Senior Product Designer
description:
Our team is on a mission to design great user experiences that help our over 2 million web customers create, configure, and develop their web presence.


We are looking for an experienced Digital Commerce Product Designer who has a solid understanding of e-commerce metrics to collaborate with our marketing leads in translating user needs and business ideas into outstanding landing pages, order and upselling/cross-selling flows, campaign concepts, and visual designs for our one.com brand.


As a passionate designer, you excel at transforming complex concepts into beautiful, simple, and user-friendly experiences. You inspire the organisation with insightful customer journeys, value propositions, and prototypes. Driven by data, you utilise market and user research methods such as interviews, surveys, usability tests, A/B tests and heatmaps to test and refine ideas both before and after implementation. This means that rather than being measured on the output of your design work, you are being measured on the success of your designs.
  

  

As a true team player, you will work closely with our marketing, product, UX and design, and development teams. And, to our 32 passionate designers, you are a sparring partner who is inspiring, results-driven and keen to make a difference.


**Qualifications**
------------------

* 5+ years of experience in e-commerce, digital commerce, marketing, or agency settings
* Degree in New Media Design, Visual Communication, Product Design, UX Design, or similar
* Strong digital commerce-focused design portfolio with a mobile-first mindset, with expertise in designing for both mobile and desktop.
* You can conduct data analysis, market, and user research to identify best practices and shape hypotheses on how best to address requirements.
* Ability to translate user needs and business goals into clear, effective design
* Skilled in user research, data analysis, customer journeys, and persona creation
* Experience with tools like Maze, HotJar, Dovetail, Mixpanel, and Google Analytics
* Advocate for user testing, customer centricity, and evidence-based design decisions
* Comfortable collaborating across teams – from concept and ideation to implementation
* You are effective in managing stakeholders. Engage and involve them from the beginning (research, strategy, concept) to the end (design and implementation).
* Proficient in Figma and Adobe Creative Cloud
* Familiar with working in Agile/Scrum teams and using design systems
* High attention to detail and strong visual aesthetics
* You provide and receive honest, valuable feedback.


You’re a curious, collaborative, and creative problem solver who enjoys turning complexity into clarity. You have a passion for beautiful, minimalist design and care deeply about creating meaningful user experiences. You’re confident in your craft, open to feedback, and thrive in a fast-moving, team-oriented environment. Most importantly, you want to make the web not just more usable — but more beautiful.  

  



**About us**
------------


one.com is a part of group.one is a leading European provider of online presence, cloud hosting, and digital marketing services. Over 2 million customers trust us with their online success. Our global team consists of 1 500+ employees operating from nearly 20 locations across 15 countries, with our headquarters in Sweden. Thanks to the support of our partners Cinven and Ontario Teachers' Pension Plan, we are steadily expanding the group's service portfolio and geographical footprint.


When you join group.one, you become a part of a global network that values collaboration, growth, and excellence. Join us in creating online success stories!

**We don't care whether you are female, male or diverse, where you come from, how old you are, what colour your skin is or what you believe in. For us, the focus is on mutual respect, personal appreciation as well as fun and motivation at work. Develop yourself - your personality - because we focus on you as a person and team member.**

**We want to continue to grow with you. That's why we look forward to getting to know you.**

title: Software Engineer
description:
We now have a new requirement and are looking for a consultant colleague with the qualifications listed below. The position is part of our consulting business, which means you will be employed by us and work either with clients or on internal projects and assignments.

*As part of your application, you may be presented to clients/partners as part of the recruitment process. If selected for the assignment, you will be employed by us and work either with clients or on internal projects and assignments as part of our consulting business.*  

  

**Job Description**  

Modernizing the way we work with front-end development, including adopting current best practices, frameworks, and tools; developing new functionalities to support our evolving business needs; and implementing solutions that reduce or prevent technical debt, ensuring long-term maintainability and scalability of the too  

  

**Your Profile (Must-have requirements)**  

* Proven experience as a full-stack developer with strong skills in modern front-end frameworks and solid backend development expertise. We work with Vue, typescript, node js and Python fast api.
* Experience in modernizing legacy front-end codebases, including implementing best practices for structure, performance, and maintainability.
* Strong understanding of UI/UX principles and ability to translate business requirements into user-friendly interfaces.
* Experience in developing new features in complex, business-critical applications.
* Familiarity with strategies for reducing and preventing technical debt.
* Competence in working with APIs, integration patterns, and cloud-based architectures.
* Ability to collaborate closely with cross-functional teams, including backend developers, and product owners.
* Strong problem-solving skills and the ability to work independently to deliver high-quality results under tight deadlines.
* Excellent communication skills in both technical and non-technical contexts.
* Experience in working with terraform will be an added advantage.

  

**Application deadline:** 03-09-2025  

  

**About Us**  

We currently employ experienced consultants in areas such as System Development, AI, Machine Learning, Testing, Cloud, Infra DevOps, and IT Project Management.  

  

Working at Deploja is something entirely different from working at an ordinary consulting company—and we are really proud of that. So, what makes us unique?  

  

We simply offer more than just a high salary and greater freedom; that’s just the beginning. With us, you’ll find the work environment and opportunities you deserve. Welcome to Deploja, where the grass is indeed greener!

 **Vi erbjuder dig följande, Valet är ditt!**


Exciting assignments with our many clients. We focus on long-term projects, which gives you the opportunity to create value for the client while also developing yourself.


A secure monthly salary – together we’ll agree on a base salary depending on your assignments.


Company car – we encourage you to choose an electric car for a more sustainable future.


Occupational pension and great opportunities for salary conversion.


Vacation – Would you like more than 30 days of vacation, perhaps 60 days?


Private health insurance, accident insurance, and life insurance for increased security.


Skills development – you set your own budget and choose the training you wish to attend.


Quality of life – Are you struggling to balance everyday life and wish to work a little less while still earning as much, if not more?

*We handle applications continuously, and due to the high workload, it's especially important to include a short motivation for the position, explaining how you meet the requirements.*

title: Product Designer
description:
**TL;DR** 
 - We’re looking for world-class product designers to help shape Lovable. You’ll lead projects end-to-end, collaborating closely with engineering. We expect a broad range of design skills, and exceptional taste. You’ll join a team at the forefront of AI, enabling anyone to create software.
   

  

**Why Lovable?**
 Lovable lets anyone and everyone build software with plain English. From solopreneurs to Fortune 100 teams, millions of people use Lovable to transform raw ideas into real products - fast. We are at the forefront of a foundational shift in software creation, which means you have an unprecedented opportunity to change the way the world works. Over 2 million people in 200+ countries already use Lovable to launch businesses, automate work, and bring their ideas to life. And we’re just getting started.
   

  

 We’re a small, talent-dense team building a generation-defining company from Stockholm. We value extreme ownership, high velocity and low-ego collaboration. We seek out people who care deeply, ship fast, and are eager to make a dent in the world.
   

  

**What We’re Looking For**
* A track record of working in high performing, fast-paced startup environments
* A portfolio showcasing successful product work loved by users and produced in high-velocity teams
* Talent for simplifying complicated user journeys into intuitive experiences
* Strong prototyping abilities with emphasis on clear visual communication
* Fluency with design systems and technical implementations
* Outstanding command of visual design, UI patterns, and interaction principles
* High aptitude for shipping and learning extraordinarily quickly
* Bonus: You ship to production, perhaps with a little help from AI
* Bonus: Experience designing AI products


**What You’ll Do**
**In one sentence:** 
 Design Lovable, making it the most Lovable piece of software ever.
   

  

* Craft detailed user flows and high-fidelity mockups for new features
* Own design projects from conception to delivery, collaborating with engineering or ideally implementing yourself with AI (we'll train you)
* Be scrappy and hands on with any design assets needed
* Establish scalable design processes that uphold quality standards
* Champion quick wins and impactful improvements
* Contribute to improving the design quality of Lovable's AI
* Help set the bar for design quality and the culture for how design works at Lovable


**How We Hire**
* Fill in a short form then jump on an initial exploratory call.
* We'll send you a quick take-home asking to present your best work over a loom video presentation.
* Join us for a round of interviews to discuss your experience in more depth
* Join us for trial work lasting 1-2 days remote or on-site. We'll see how you tick and you get to meet the team and explore whether joining Lovable feels right for you.


**Important Note** 
 :
   

  

* Please submit your application in English. It’s our company language so you’ll be speaking lots of it if you join.
* We treat all candidates equally - if you’re interested please apply through our careers portal.

title: Chief Product Officer
description:
Education changes lives. But tech hasn’t lived up to its promise for the more than 1 billion students in school around the world — at least not yet.
 



  





 At Kognity, we’re here to change that.
 



  





 We’re a 125-person EdTech scale-up powering learning in 120+ countries. Our intelligent platform combines rich pedagogy with smart AI to help students and teachers thrive — from international schools to US high schools.
 



  





 Now we’re looking for a bold, visionary Chief Product Officer to take our product and our impact to the next level.
 



  





 This is a company-shaping opportunity. If you want to build the world’s most impactful AI-enabled learning platform — and you’ve got the vision, clarity, and drive to make it happen — we’d love to talk.
 



  





  





**Why Kognity is the place to be:** 




  




* ✨ Educational Innovation – Lead the next wave of AI-powered learning solutions
* 🌍 Global Reach – Customers in 120+ countries
* 🤝 Collaborative Culture – Join a smart, ambitious team that values impact over ego
* 📈 Ownership – You’ll shape the product vision, structure the org, and drive our AI-first transformation
* 💪 High-Performing Teams – Work with sharp, driven colleagues across product, engineering, and AI who raise the bar every day.



  





**What you’ll do:** 




  




* 🚀 Set and drive an ambitious product vision that raises the bar for execution, clarity, and customer value across the company.
* 🌍 Accelerate global growth by leading initiatives that enable us to launch new products into new markets faster than ever before.
* 🤖 Leverage AI to radically increase our product velocity and impact — from smarter content workflows to more personalised, scalable learning experiences.
* ✨ Deliver breakthrough AI-powered features that speed up development, improve ease of use, and enhance the daily experience of millions of teachers and students worldwide.
* 🔥 Inspire, challenge, and align the product organisation around bold goals that maximise progress and transform the future of learning.



  





  





**What we’re looking for:** 




  




* 📌 Experience leading product functions in technology scale-ups (ideally company sizes of 50–300 people and >$10M revenue)
* 🎯 Proven ability to set strategy, structure teams, and turn vision into execution — consistently raising the bar on ambition and clarity
* 🌍 Record of delivering big outcomes — from launching new products to entering new markets, not just maintaining what already exists
* 🔥 Track record of driving pace, clarity, and ambition across cross-functional teams
* 🤖 Real examples of integrating AI into product thinking, operations, and delivery
* 🧭 High-trajectory profile with role evolution, growing scope, or founder experience



  





**Our values:** 




  




* 🏅 We take ownership – We take initiative and act with self-leadership. We don’t wait for someone else to solve problems we see.
* 🤖 We leverage AI – We apply AI to enhance creativity, decisions, and execution to allow for impact maximization.
* 💡 We drive customer value – Success for our customers drives our progress. We create value for them in everything we do.
* 🗣️ We are transparent – We are radically transparent with opinions and feedback, and we share information widely.
* 💙 We take care of ourselves and each other – We work hard and passionately, but also prioritise our own well-being, and that of our colleagues.



  





**Our leadership principles:** 




  




* 🧑 🤝 🧑
 **Have the best team in place** 
 - Leaders at Kognity build and maintain high-performing teams by recruiting top talent and enabling them to do their best work. We never compromise when hiring, so you can be certain that your colleagues will be awesome.
* 🌱
 **Build trust and caring relationships -** 
 Leaders invest time in getting to know their team, sharing their own stories, and encouraging strong peer connections. This builds trust, supports well-being, and fosters open communication.
* ⚖️
 **Establish radical candor -** 
 Leaders give honest, direct feedback—about themselves and others—to build mutual trust and drive fast personal and professional growth.
* 🎯
 **Delegate ownership -** 
 Instead of assigning tasks, leaders delegate full ownership with clear goals, accountability, and support. This drives innovation, growth, and scalability.



  





**Interview Process** 




  




1. **Introductory Chat** 
 – Meet our recruiter to share your accomplishments & leadership philosophy.
2. **CEO Deep Dive** 
 – Explore our product vision and discuss how you could shape it.
3. **Case Study** 
 – Show us how you’d build and lead the product function at Kognity.
4. **Leadership discussion** 
 – Share your philosophy, reflections, and the principles that guide how you build and inspire high-performing teams.
5. **Final Conversations** 
 – Wrap-up with the CEO and a member of our board.



  





 Every qualified person will be evaluated regardless of age, gender, identity, nationality, ethnicity, sexual orientation, disability status or religion. We’re committed to building a diverse, inclusive team and welcome people of all backgrounds, experiences, perspectives, and abilities

title: Campaign Management Lead (m/f/d)
description:
**We are looking for a**
**Campaign Management Lead (m/f/d)**
**(unlimited, full-time) Join our team at one of our locations in Berlin, Verl or Stockholm – flexible working conditions available**
 At Riverty, we’re redefining how people and businesses interact with financial services across Europe. As our Campaign Management Lead (m/f/d), you will lead a new, cross-functional team at the intersection of data, creativity, and business growth. You'll be responsible for orchestrating full-funnel, insight-driven marketing initiatives for both consumers (B2C) and merchants (B2B) — driving measurable impact across all growth channels.
   

  

**Your Responsibilities**
* Lead, coach, and inspire a team of 10 experts in growth marketing, UX, reporting, and market research.
* Foster a high-performance culture focused on ownership, speed, and learning.
* Own the development and execution of full-funnel, international marketing campaigns for B2B and B2C.
* Optimize account-based and platform-based marketing processes to drive high-quality leads and revenue growth.
* Champion audience insights and persona development to inform campaign messaging and targeting.
* Define and monitor marketing KPIs, ensuring campaign efficiency, lead quality, and strong ROI.
* Drive UX and reporting excellence to ensure campaigns meet experience, legal, and brand standards.
* Collaborate closely with Product, Commercial, Legal, and Country Leads to ensure market fit and delivery success.


**Your Profile**
* Proven experience in leading data-driven marketing teams, with a focus on strategic campaign execution across B2B and B2C.
* Demonstrated success in account-based marketing and full-funnel campaigns that deliver measurable business results.
* Strong leadership track record in managing cross-functional, international teams.
* Analytical mindset with fluency in KPIs, marketing performance metrics, and campaign automation.
* Experience in fintech, financial services, or other regulated industries is a strong plus.
* Excellent communication and stakeholder management skills; fluent in English, German is a plus.
* A “can-do” attitude, with the ability to prioritize what truly matters, and the ambition to continuously learn and evolve.


 #EUR35
   

  

**Benefits:**
* At Riverty, you can be who you are. We are committed to creating an inclusive environment and a culture of appreciation, enriched by our employee networks.
* Prioritize your health with supported sports and leisure activities.
* Take advantage of our numerous training and development opportunities! Enhance your skills with training offered by the Bertelsmann University, language courses, or leadership training.
* Benefit from our discounts on Bertelsmann products and financial incentives.
* With our diverse work models, you can tailor your work to your preferences. Take advantage of mobile office, flexible working hours, and part-time models.

title: Strategic Product Manager/Head of Product Management - Tietoevry Banking (m/f/d)
description:
**Job Description**
**Strategic Product Manager/Head of Product Management - Tietoevry Banking (m/f/d)**
 We are looking for a
 **Strategic Product Manager** 
 who wants to be part of Tietoevry Banking. Tietoevry Banking is the leading financial services software and solution partner in the Nordics. We offer modular, pre-integrated banking as a service solutions and market-leading software for core, payments, credit, cards, financial fraud, and wealth. With our scale, expertise, and specialization, we empower financial institutions to enhance agility, efficiency, and accelerate digital transformation.
   

  

**When Joining Tietoevry Banking You Will Work On**
* Product Vision and Strategy: Develop and communicate a clear product vision and mid-term/long-term strategy that aligns with the company's overall Strategy, objectives and market trends. Define target customers, licensing and pricing models to address predictable long-term revenue flow. Define complementary services to support successful implementation and maintenance, ensure additional revenue flow.
* Market Analysis: Conduct in-depth market research to understand industry trends, competitive landscape, regulatory changes and customer needs, providing input and recommendations for strategic decisions for mid-term and long-term initiatives. Identify opportunities for product innovation and differentiation.
* Roadmap Development: Ability to translate market needs and business opportunities to a strategic roadmap and balance long/short-term needs. Create and maintain a high-level product roadmap that outlines key milestones, deliverables, and timelines, ensuring alignment with business priorities. Address product lifecycles, including planning sunsetting and migration strategies. Define innovation inception approaches. Plan portfolio modernization to fit market needs, ensure future growth and competitive costs.
* Relationship Building: Establish and maintain strong relationships with existing and potential clients, partners, and industry influencers to create new business opportunities. Participate, present and be influencer in conferences, industry workgroups. Build relationships with industry stakeholders globally. Demonstrate cultural awareness and the ability to adapt product strategies to various regional requirements.
* Stakeholder management: Collaborate closely with the sales team and engage with other departments, including engineering, marketing, project management and customer teams, to support with sales and ensure successful product development and launch. Cooperate cross-units in Cards and Transaction Banking and other units in Banking.
* Customer Insights: Prepare and present vision, pitches, and presentations to existing and potential clients and partners, effectively communicating the value proposition. Gather and analyze customer feedback and usage data to inform product decisions and enhance user experience.
* Performance Metrics: Define and track key performance indicators (KPIs) to measure product success and identify areas for improvement, ensure data-based decision making. Keep accountability on product/service profitability. Align models and use cross unit template and processes.
* Go-to-Market Strategy: Collaborate with marketing and sales teams to develop and execute effective go-to-market strategies for product launches and updates. Collaborate with Security, Compliance and Privacy teams to identify market or country potential risks and opportunities.
* Risk Management: Identify potential risks and develop mitigation strategies to ensure successful product delivery and adoption.
* Leadership and Mentorship: Provide guidance and mentorship to product managers and team members, fostering a culture of innovation and continuous improvement.


**Who We Are Looking For**
* A Bachelor's degree in business, Marketing, or a related field; MBA or advanced degree preferred.
* Proven experience in product management, with a focus on strategic planning and execution.
* Strong analytical and problem-solving skills, with the ability to make data-driven decisions.
* Excellent communication and interpersonal skills, with the ability to influence and collaborate with stakeholders at all levels.
* Experience in Cards and Payments, with a large network of connections with industry experts and decision-makers.
* Familiarity with European and Nordic customers.


**We Also Believe You Have**
* Strong strategic thinking skills to develop and implement effective product strategies.
* A market and customer focus that drives product innovation and meets customer needs.
* Excellent relationship-building abilities to establish connections with clients, partners, and industry stakeholders.
* Proficiency in public speaking to effectively present ideas and influence audiences.
* Strong negotiation and influencing skills to advocate for product initiatives and secure buy-in.
* A creative mindset that fosters innovation and the development of unique solutions.
* A results-oriented approach that emphasizes accountability and achievement of product goals.


 As a person, we believe you are a team player who takes action and demonstrates responsibility to organize your work and solve your tasks. With our agile end-to-end development process, you will continue to both learn from and coach your colleagues, so communication is important for us. Technology is developing fast, so learning new cutting-edge technologies is something you strive to do.
   

  

**What We Offer**
* We offer you professional growth, meaningful projects, an open culture, and an outstanding work-life balance!
* We provide a flexible hybrid work model as part of our culture and way of working.
* Competitive salary (up to 7,000 EUR gross per month in Latvia), based on experience and qualifications.
* Finally, we believe in curiosity and learning as a lifestyle where you need to unlearn and relearn every day as new possibilities emerge.


**Did we get you inspired?**
 We look forward to your application! Interviews will be held continuously, so we encourage you to apply today! For more information or questions, please contact the Talent Acquisition team at recruitmentinbanking@tietoevry.com.
   

  

 Hope to hear from you soon!
   

  

 Location: Rīga - Verde, Roberta Hirša 1
   

  

*On specific positions, we might perform background checks.*
**About Tietoevry**
 Tietoevry creates purposeful technology that reinvents the world for good. We are a leading technology company with a strong Nordic heritage and global capabilities. Based on our core values of openness, trust, and diversity, we work with our customers to develop digital futures where businesses, societies, and humanity thrive.
   

  

 Our 24,000 experts globally specialize in cloud, data, and software, serving thousands of enterprise and public-sector customers in more than 90 countries. Tietoevry’s annual turnover is approximately EUR 3 billion, and the company’s shares are listed on the NASDAQ exchange in Helsinki and Stockholm, as well as on Oslo Børs. Familiarize yourself with what we do.
   

  

 Additional Information
   

  

 At Tietoevry, we believe in the power of diversity, equity, and inclusion. We encourage applicants of all backgrounds, genders (m/f/d), and walks of life to join our team, as we believe that this fosters an inspiring workplace and fuels innovation. Our commitment to openness, trust, and diversity is at the heart of our mission to create digital futures that benefit businesses, societies, and humanity.
   

  

 Diversity, equity and inclusion (tietoevry.com)

title: Enterprise Networking Engineer (Spanish)
description:
At Ubiquiti Inc., we create technology platforms for Businesses, Smart Homes, and Internet Service Providers, driven by our goal to connect everyone, everywhere. To date, Ubiquiti has shipped over 100 million devices worldwide, from ISP networking products to next generation of IT solutions. Our growth is made possible by the dedicated team of hundreds behind the scenes. From software developers and product managers to designers and strategists, Team UI is driven to achieve our common goal: Rethinking IT. At Ubiquiti, you’ll heighten your potential and broaden your horizons - all while shaping the future of connectivity.
   

  

 Join forces with us on our mission to build a better IT industry. We are currently looking for an Enterprise Networking Engineer (Spanish) to provide support to new enterprise customers while working cross-functionally with QA, strategy, and engineering teams to drive product improvement.
   

  

***Please note that applicants must live in Sweden and hold a valid work permit at the time of application to be considered for this role.***
**Responsibilites**
* Provide technical support for Ubiquiti’s product lines via phone, web chat, and email
* Own incoming requests from beginning to resolution for premium customers
* Educate and provide recommendations for Ubiquiti’s products, features, and best practices
* Assisting customers with architectural design
* Troubleshoot and diagnose issues, including providing workarounds when required
* Identify areas of opportunity for improvement for user experience, working with development and product management teams
* Stay up-to-date on Ubiquiti products and related industry technologies
* Work cross-functionally with key stakeholders to provide feedback and drive product improvements


**Requirements**
* Experience with networking, including routing, switching, WiFi protocols, security, and VPNs, and an understanding of various networking protocols (TCP/IP, WireGuard, etc) and major operating systems (Linux) is preferred
* Knowledge of troubleshooting techniques and how to effectively communicate them to customers
* Ability to work in a fast-paced environment with changing priorities
* Expertise around factors that impact UX (e.g., how can we improve our products or services), and CX (e.g., how can we improve our support experience and customer interactions)
* Excellent written and verbal communication skills in English
* Fluent in Spanish (hard requirement)
* Knowledge of and enthusiasm for Ubiquiti products is a bonus


**Ideal Education And Experience**
* Three-year university degree, ideally with an Engineering or technical focus
* At least 5 years of experience in a similar role
* A background in the networking industry, ideally with practical, hands-on experience
* A track record of using in-depth troubleshooting to understand and resolve customer issues


**Benefits**
* International work environment
* Competitive compensation package including wellness allowance, occupational pension, medical insurance, private health insurance, life insurance, and work-injury insurance
* Five weeks of holiday per year
* Flexible work hours and a hybrid work model
* Modern office space located in Epicenter (Hötorget)
* Access to all the latest Ubiquiti products and prototypes for home use and tests


***Please note that a background check will be conducted in the final stage of the recruitment process***

title: Junior IT Support Technician
description:
Hi I’m Luke, Talent Acquisition Manager here at Starbreeze, and I’m looking for a **Junior IT Support Technician** to join Thomas’ IT team here in our Crew.


You will be IT’s first point of contact for our employees, providing technical support, resolving issues, and ensuring a positive user experience. The ideal candidate is a service-minded person with some related work experience and a passion for games.


So, do you have a knack for turning your colleagues’ frowns upside down by troubleshooting and helping out? Then we want to hear from you!


Please note that this role must be based in our Stockholm office 5 days per week.

 **What you'll be doing:**

* **Be a user champion:** Respond to servicedesk tickets and in-person requests, troubleshoot hardware, software and network issues, and guide users with clear instructions.
* **Resolve and track:** Log issues in our ticketing system, escalating where necessary, and ensure your colleagues are happy with the support they get.
* **Keep things running smoothly:** Help with setting up new equipment, routine maintenance, and making sure our systems are always in top shape.
* **Team up:** Work closely with the rest of the IT team, share your knowledge, and help us make our support processes even better.
* **Share the knowledge:** Create helpful guides and documentation, and maybe even run some basic training sessions to help everyone become a tech superstar.

 **What we're looking for:**

* You've got some experience under your belt as a 1st or 2nd line IT support technician.
* You're fluent in English (both written and verbal) and a strong communicator, able to communicate technical information to less technical colleagues clearly and understandably.
* You know your way around internal computer components and troubleshooting.
* You have experience configuring and troubleshooting OS-related issues in Windows and macOS.
* You have knowledge of basic networking concepts and troubleshooting.
* You’re comfortable installing, replacing and troubleshooting hardware.
* You have experience installing and reinstalling operations systems from scratch.
* You’re comfortable both working independently and as part of a team.
* You’re curious and eager to learn, especially related to technology.
* You're passionate about games and the gaming industry!

 **Bonus points if you have:**

* Prior experience working with Microsoft Intune.
* Experience working with and administrating Google Workspace, Microsoft Entra ID or similar cloud-based identity providers.
* An understanding of game development and build systems.
* A security mindset.
* Enjoy writing documentation.

 **Interview process:**

* 30-minute Google Meet call with a member of our Talent Acquisition team.
* 1-hour interview with our Head of IT and IT Support Technician.
* 1-hour interview with our IT Systems Engineer and HR Specialist.

 **Perks of the job:**


We know that great work comes from happy people, so we've levelled up our benefits package:

* **Flexible hours:** Our core hours of 09:30 AM to 15:30 PM CET helps you to structure your day that is best and most productive for your lifestyle and for your team.
* **Time off:** You'll get 30 vacation days, plus an extra 5 days to use as you please, and even a paid moving day. That's all on top of public holidays!
* **Pension:** We offer a generous occupational pension plan through Nordnet.
* Insurances: We've got you covered with comprehensive private healthcare, life, and accident insurance.
* **Wellness allowance:** We offer a 5000 SEK annual wellness allowance to put towards whatever helps you feel your best; whether that’s a gym membership, yoga classes, swimming lessons, or whatever else you do for you!
* **Bike to work:** Enjoy tax-free bike leasing through Lease a Bike.
* **Relax and recharge:** We offer free monthly in-office massage sessions to help you unwind and recharge.
* **Fun and games:** We're a team that loves to hang out; whether that’s Monday breakfasts, frequent fika, or our weekly Dungeons & Dragons club.
* **A great new office:** Our new digs are right in the heart of Stockholm, surrounded by great restaurants, gyms, and awesome spots for Friday after-work drinks.

 **About Starbreeze**


At Starbreeze, we believe games are more than just entertainment, they’re a way to bring people together. From the pulse-pounding, cooperative heists of PAYDAY to our upcoming Dungeons & Dragons adventure, we create experiences that thrive on teamwork, strategy, and the thrill of emergent gameplay. Our mission is to build vibrant games that offer infinite replayability, allowing players to forge their own stories and adventures together.


Every Starbreeze employee helps shape this vision. Whether you’re crafting intricate game worlds or developing the systems that bring players together, your creativity and passion will drive the future of cooperative gaming. Join us in our journey to create innovative, immersive experiences that unite players and redefine what gaming can achieve.


Starbreeze values diversity and inclusion, and is proud to be an equal opportunity employer. We welcome you as who you are, no matter where you are from or what games you play. If there are preparations or accommodations that we can make to help ensure that you have a comfortable and positive interview experience, please let us know.

 **Ready to join the Crew?**


If this all sounds good to you, then we can't wait to hear from you! Send us your CV and a cover letter in English. We review applications continuously, so the sooner you apply, the better.

 **P.S.** A heads-up for our friends in the agency world: we're handling this one ourselves, so please don't send us any unsolicited CVs to our TA team or managers.

title: Fullstack inom Python/React
description:
### **Uppdragsbeskrivning**

**Systemutvecklare Fullstack (Python/React) – AI-labb i Jönköping**


Vill du arbeta i ett AI-labb där innovation, nyfikenhet och digitalisering står i centrum? Nu söker vi en **driven Fullstack-utvecklare** som vill kombinera **Python och React** i spännande projekt med tydlig AI-inriktning.


AI-labbet är ett tvärfunktionellt team med utvecklare, strateger och stödfunktioner som tillsammans utforskar nya lösningar. Här får du frihet att ta initiativ, testa, forska och bidra till att bygga framtidens AI-verktyg. Arbetet är utforskande, agilt och ligger i teknikens framkant.


Uppdraget är på heltid, med placering i **Jönköping**. Möjlighet till distansarbete upp till två dagar i veckan finns efter introduktion. Arbetsspråket är **svenska**.

### **Vi söker dig som har**

**Skallkrav**

* Dokumenterad erfarenhet av **Python**
* Erfarenhet av **React** eller annat modernt frontendramverk
* Vana av att arbeta i **agila team** (Scrum, agil värdegrund)
* Goda kunskaper i **Git**
* Genomförd utbildning i **digital tillgänglighet (EN301 549)**

**Meriterande erfarenheter**

* React, TypeScript, Vite
* Kubernetes, Helm
* REST-API:er
* AI-områden: AI Governance, Machine Learning, PyTorch, TensorFlow, Transformers, LLM, RAG
* Dataetik och säkerhet, vektordatabaser
* Java, Quarkus

### **Varför detta uppdrag?**

* Du blir en del av ett **nyfiket och tvärfunktionellt team**.
* Du får möjlighet att **påverka både teknikval och arbetssätt**.
* Du får arbeta i en organisation som satsar på **AI, digitalisering och innovation**.
* Vi värdesätter **personliga egenskaper och rätt matchning** snarare än bara checklistor.

**Ansök direkt!** Vi hanterar ansökningar löpande och uppdraget kan stängas innan sista ansökningsdag.

title: Teamlead / chefsstöd till IT-divisionen
description:
**Teamlead / chefsstöd till IT-divisionen**
===========================================


Sista ansökningsdatum: 8 september

Svenska kraftnät är en nyckelaktör i energiomställningen. Vår IT-division växer för att möjliggöra en fördubblad elproduktion och en fossilfri framtid. Med ny teknik ökar vi både infrastrukturens kapacitet och utvecklingstakten inom digitalisering och processer.


**Om tjänsten**
---------------



Som Teamlead / chefsstöd på avdelningen Verksamhets- och IT-utvecklingsstöd stöttar du avdelningschefen och enhetscheferna med varierande uppdrag och arbetsuppgifter. Du ingår i avdelningens ledningsgrupp där du skriver protokoll samt är delaktig i de operativa och strategiska frågor som behandlas där. Rollen kan även innebära uppdrag som projektledare, uppdragsledare, förvaltningsledare samt att under kortare perioder gå in som tillförordnad enhetschef.



Arbetsuppgifter:


* Driva och leda projekt och uppdrag inom verksamhetsutveckling och IT-utveckling.
* Delta i och stötta vid rekrytering, konsultavrop och upphandlingar.
* Arrangera och facilitera möten, workshops och konferenser.
* Samordna prognos- och budgetarbete.
* Arbeta med diverse rapportering och uppföljning till exempel äska resurser, kartlägga arbetsmiljörisker med mera.
* Koordinera avdelningens strategiska arbete samt driva strategiska förflyttningar.
* Interim teamledare vilket innebär att arbetsleda team, tilldela resurser, fatta beslut i personalrelaterade frågor, ingå i styrgrupp mm.
* Protokollföra vid möten och stötta chefer i administrativt arbete.


Avdelningen Verksamhets- och IT-utvecklingsstöd har det övergripande strategiska och operativa leveransansvaret för de IT-lösningar som möjliggör att Gemensamma Funktioner och Finans kan arbeta enligt sina processer. Avdelningen ansvarar även för att utveckla IT-divisionens förmågor inom applikationsutveckling, applikationsförvaltning, applikationsdrift, krav och test, integration, utveckling samt container.


**Om dig**
----------


**Skallkrav:**



Vi söker dig som är strukturerad med god administrativ förmåga. Du har lätt för att arbeta enligt en process, organisera och planera ditt arbete, slutföra det som påbörjats och hålla deadlines. Du är samarbetsorienterad och anpassar dig för att hitta lösningar som tillgodoser det gemensamma målet. För att bli framgångsrik ser vi att du är lösningsorienterad och resultatinriktad med förmåga att ta initiativ, prioritera och hitta lösningar på uppkomna problem.



Vi lägger stor vikt vid dina personliga egenskaper.



Vidare har du en utbildning inom IT eller motsvarande kompetens förvärvad på annat sätt som Svenska kraftnät bedömer likvärdig. Du har även:


* Flerårig aktuell och relevant arbetslivserfarenhet från en komplex IT-miljö som projektledare, uppdragsledare, teamledare eller motsvarande roll.
* Erfarenhet av att arbetsleda agila team.
* God förmåga att uttrycka dig i tal och skrift på svenska och engelska.


Vi ser det som **meriterande** om du har erfarenhet av:


* Facilitera workshoppar.
* Säkerhetskänslig verksamhet.

**Bra att veta**
----------------


* Tjänsten är placerad i Stockholm / Sundbyberg
* Möjlighet till distansarbete upp till 50 % #LI-hybrid
* Sista ansökningsdag är den 8 september 2025. Vi använder urvalsfrågor istället för personligt brev.
* Tjänsten är en tillsvidaretjänst
* Förmåner | Svenska kraftnät

Vid frågor om tjänsten kontakta gärna rekryterande chef Tina Stödberg, 010-475 82 92. Vid frågor om rekryteringsprocessen kontakta ansvarig rekryterare Maria Sahlén, 010-489 20 27 (maria.sahlen2@svk.se). Fackliga representanter är Annika Ingeborn, SACO, 010-475 87 72 och Mikael Hedenheim ST, 010-475 84 68. Du når oss också via e-post: fornamn.efternamn@svk.se


*Under semestertider nås vi på mail och svarstiden kan vara längre än vanligt*.



Jobba här – bli en viktig del av vår energiframtid | Svenska kraftnät


Vi undanber oss direktkontakt med bemannings- och rekryteringsföretag samt säljare i samband med rekrytering, vi har upphandlade avtal som gäller för Svenska kraftnät som statlig myndighet.

**Övrig information**
---------------------


Vi ställer höga krav på våra medarbetares säkerhets- och sekretessmedvetenhet. Innan ett beslut om anställning fattas kommer en säkerhetsprövning enligt säkerhetsskyddslagen (2018:585) att genomföras i de fall befattningen innebär hantering av säkerhetsskyddsklassificerade uppgifter eller deltagande i säkerhetskänslig verksamhet. Om anställningen avser befattning i säkerhetsklass kommer säkerhetsprövningen även att innefatta en registerkontroll och, i vissa fall, en särskild personutredning. För anställning på Svenska kraftnät kan det vara ett krav på svenskt medborgarskap i vissa befattningar. Med anställningen följer en skyldighet att krigsplaceras. För mer information om säkerhetsprövning Svenska kraftnät arbetar för att främja mångfald och motverka diskriminering och ser gärna sökanden med olika bakgrund och erfarenheter till våra rekryteringar. Lär känna Svenska kraftnät och hur det är att arbeta hos oss: Lär känna oss på Svenska kraftnät

title: Senior Cybersäkerhetsspecialist
description:
Vi har nu ett nytt behov och söker därför en konsultkollega med nedan kvalifikationer. Tjänsten är en del av vår konsultverksamhet vilket innebär att du blir anställd av oss och arbetar hos kund alt. interna projekt och åtaganden.

 **Jobbeskrivning**  

Tillsammans med enhetens medarbetare kommer du använda din förmåga för problemlösning för att tackla de organisatoriska utmaningar som kan uppstå ur ett cyberperspektiv i en stor organisation med många användare. Du kommer delta i den långsiktiga planeringen för vårt cyberförsvar och undersöka möjliga alternativ för framtida utveckling. Du kommer också arbeta nära it-säkerhetsenhetens gruppering för systemutveckling i syfte att förbättra vår aktiva försvarsförmåga.  

Vidare kommer du att verka i vår it-säkerhetsenhet som både strategisk rådgivare och tekniskt stöd till enhetsledningen. Rollen kräver därför en gedigen bakgrund med ett tekniskt fokus inom operationell cybersäkerhet.  

  

**Din profil (Skall krav)**  

* Minst 10 antal års arbetslivserfarenhet av arbete med teknisk cybersäkerhet inom stora organisationer (mer än 10 000 slutanvändare)
* Minst 8 antal års arbetslivserfarenhet av SIEM
* Minst 5 antal års arbetslivserfarenhet av ledande befattning
* Minst 5 antal års arbetslivserfarenhet av operationell cybersäkerhet (SOC/CSIRT)
* Minst 5 antal års arbetslivserfarenhet av systemutveckling on-premise

  

**Meriterande**  

* Flerårig arbetslivserfarenhet av it-miljö på stor myndighet med minst 10 000 slutanvändare
* Dokumenterad erfarenhet av Cribl
* Dokumenterad erfarenhet av cybersäkerhetsövningar
* Dokumenterad erfarenhet inom Cyber Threat Intelligence (CTI)
* Flerårig arbetslivserfarenhet inom Ansible & Git

  

**Sista ansökningdatum:** 04-09-2025 **Om Deploja**  

  

Vi sysselsätter idag erfarna konsulter, inom bl.a. Systemutveckling, Test, Arkitektur, IT-Projektledning, IT-Säkerhet.  

  

Att jobba på Deploja är något helt annat än att arbeta på ett vanligt konsultbolag – och det är vi riktigt stolta över. Vad är det då som gör oss unika?

  

Vi erbjuder helt enkelt mer än bara hög lön och större frihet, det är bara början. Hos oss hittar du den arbetsmiljö och de möjligheter du förtjänar. Välkommen till Deploja, där gräset faktiskt är grönare!

 **Vi erbjuder dig följande, Valet är ditt!**


Spännande uppdrag hos våra många kunder. Vi fokuserar på långsiktiga uppdrag, vilket ger dig möjlighet att skapa värde för kunden samtidigt som du utvecklas själv.


En trygg månadslön – tillsammans bestämmer vi en grundlön baserad på dina uppdrag.


Tjänstebil – vi uppmuntrar dig att välja en elbil för en mer hållbar framtid.


Tjänstepension och stora möjligheter till löneväxling.


Semester - Önskar du mer än 30 dagar semester, kanske 60 dagar?


Privat sjukvårdsförsäkring, olycksfallsförsäkring och livförsäkring för ökad trygghet.

  

Kompetensutveckling – du får själv sätta din budget och välja vilka utbildningar du vill delta i.


Livskvalitet - Har du kanske svårt att få ihop pusslet i vardagen och önskar arbeta lite mindre och ändå kunna tjäna lika mycket om inte mer?

 *Vi hanterar ansökningar löpande, med hänsyn till höga arbetstrycket är det extra viktigt med en kort motivering för tjänsten som förklarar hur man möter kraven.*

title: Cyber Security Engineer
description:
We now have a new requirement and are looking for a consultant colleague with the qualifications listed below. The position is part of our consulting business, which means you will be employed by us and work either with clients or on internal projects and assignments.

*As part of your application, you may be presented to clients/partners as part of the recruitment process. If selected for the assignment, you will be employed by us and work either with clients or on internal projects and assignments as part of our consulting business.*  

  

**Job Description**

  

* Design and implement SSE solutions (Zscaler, Netskope, Palo Alto, or equivalent) to secure internet access and private applications (ZTNA).
* Develop strategies for network segmentation within data centers.
* Configure and manage IP-VPNs for secure communication, both on-premises and in Azure.
* Design, deploy, and maintain Network Detection & Response (NDR) solutions.
* Manage firewall configurations (Cisco FTS, Palo Alto, Fortinet).
* Deploy and maintain IDS/IPS systems.
* Work with core network protocols (TCP/IP, DNS, HTTP/S, certificates, etc.).
* Implement Zero Trust Network Access across hybrid environments (on-prem, private, and public clouds).
* Contribute to security architecture, threat modeling, hardening, log management, vulnerability analysis, and system reviews.
* Ensure compliance with regulations (GDPR, PCI-DSS, Schrems, etc.).
* Work with cloud networking and security in Azure and GCP.
* Troubleshoot and automate network tasks, ideally with Python scripting.

  

**Your Profile (Must-have requirements)**

* Azure Security Engineer certification (e.g., AZ-104).

  

**Meritorious**

* Certifications such as CCNP Security, CCIE, CISSP or similar.
* Additional security certifications (Security+, GCIA, GCIH, GREM, CEH, GCFA, etc.).
* Azure Security Engineer or GCP Security Engineer certification.

 **Application deadline:** 05-09-2025  


  

**About Us**  

We currently employ experienced consultants in areas such as System Development, AI, Machine Learning, Testing, Cloud, Infra DevOps, and IT Project Management.  

  

Working at Deploja is something entirely different from working at an ordinary consulting company—and we are really proud of that. So, what makes us unique?  

  

We simply offer more than just a high salary and greater freedom; that’s just the beginning. With us, you’ll find the work environment and opportunities you deserve. Welcome to Deploja, where the grass is indeed greener!

 **Vi erbjuder dig följande, Valet är ditt!**


Exciting assignments with our many clients. We focus on long-term projects, which gives you the opportunity to create value for the client while also developing yourself.


A secure monthly salary – together we’ll agree on a base salary depending on your assignments.


Company car – we encourage you to choose an electric car for a more sustainable future.


Occupational pension and great opportunities for salary conversion.


Vacation – Would you like more than 30 days of vacation, perhaps 60 days?


Private health insurance, accident insurance, and life insurance for increased security.


Skills development – you set your own budget and choose the training you wish to attend.


Quality of life – Are you struggling to balance everyday life and wish to work a little less while still earning as much, if not more?

*We handle applications continuously, and due to the high workload, it's especially important to include a short motivation for the position, explaining how you meet the requirements.*

title: Senior Testautomatiserare
description:
Vi har nu ett nytt behov och söker därför en konsultkollega med nedan kvalifikationer. Tjänsten är en del av vår konsultverksamhet vilket innebär att du blir anställd av oss och arbetar hos kund alt. interna projekt och åtaganden.

 **Jobbeskrivning**  

Ta fram teststrategier och planera testaktiviteter för teamets leveranser  

Designa, utveckla och köra testfall  

Identifiera defekter, felsöka och hantera felrapportering  

Hantera miljöer och verktyg för test  

  

**Din profil (Skall krav)**  

* Minst 5 års aktuell arbetslivserfarenhet av mjukvarutest
* Relevant eftergymnasial IT-utbildning från högskola eller universitet
* Minst 3 års aktuell erfarenhet av testautomation
* Mycket god kommunikativ förmåga på svenska i tal och skrif

  

**Meriterande**  

* Programmeringskunskaper, främst i Java
* Erfarenhet av SQL
* Erfarenhet av testning av mikrotjänster och containerbaserade lösningar
* Erfarenhet av DevOps och CI/CD
* Erfarenhet av Cypress

  

**Sista ansökningdatum:** 04-09-2025 **Om Deploja**  

Vi sysselsätter idag erfarna konsulter, inom bl.a. Systemutveckling, Test, Arkitektur, IT-Projektledning, IT-Säkerhet.  

  

Att jobba på Deploja är något helt annat än att arbeta på ett vanligt konsultbolag – och det är vi riktigt stolta över. Vad är det då som gör oss unika?

  

Vi erbjuder helt enkelt mer än bara hög lön och större frihet, det är bara början. Hos oss hittar du den arbetsmiljö och de möjligheter du förtjänar. Välkommen till Deploja, där gräset faktiskt är grönare!

 **Vi erbjuder dig följande, Valet är ditt!**


Spännande uppdrag hos våra många kunder. Vi fokuserar på långsiktiga uppdrag, vilket ger dig möjlighet att skapa värde för kunden samtidigt som du utvecklas själv.


En trygg månadslön – tillsammans bestämmer vi en grundlön baserad på dina uppdrag.


Tjänstebil – vi uppmuntrar dig att välja en elbil för en mer hållbar framtid.


Tjänstepension och stora möjligheter till löneväxling.


Semester - Önskar du mer än 30 dagar semester, kanske 60 dagar?


Privat sjukvårdsförsäkring, olycksfallsförsäkring och livförsäkring för ökad trygghet.

  

Kompetensutveckling – du får själv sätta din budget och välja vilka utbildningar du vill delta i.


Livskvalitet - Har du kanske svårt att få ihop pusslet i vardagen och önskar arbeta lite mindre och ändå kunna tjäna lika mycket om inte mer?

 *Vi hanterar ansökningar löpande, med hänsyn till höga arbetstrycket är det extra viktigt med en kort motivering för tjänsten som förklarar hur man möter kraven.*

title: Testledare
description:
**Rollen:**

* Planera, leda och följa upp testarbete inom ramen för införandeprojektet
* Upprätta teststrategi och testplaner med hänsyn till både verksamhetsmål och tekniska krav
* Samordna testresurser internt och med extern systemleverantör
* Ansvara för utformning och dokumentation gällande testfall för användarvänlighet,
* funktionalitet och integrationer, genom att samordna expertresurser inom verksamheten
* Samordna acceptanstest i samarbete med verksamhetsrepresentanter
* Identifiera, dokumentera och följa upp fel och förbättringsförslag
* Arbeta nära projektledning, verksamhetsrepresentanter och kravanalytiker

  

**Ska-krav:**

* Eftergymnasial examen inom IT, systemvetenskap eller motsvarande.
* Minst fem (5) års samlad erfarenhet som testledare i komplexa införandeprojekt.
* Förmåga att uttrycka sig obehindrat i tal och skrift på svenska.

**Meriterande:**

  

* Genomfört minst ett (1) dokumenterat testledaruppdrag avseende Learning Management Systems (LMS) eller kompetensplaneringssystem (TMS).
* Inneha ett (1) giltigt certifikat enligt ISTQB på minst nivå Foundation Level.

Dokumenterad erfarenhet av arbete med informationssäkerhet och dataskydd i offentlig sektor.  
* 

  

  

**Var god förklara hur du uppfyller alla kraven.**

**Ort:** Stockholm

**Sista ansökningdag: 06-09-2025**
